name: Piper's Call
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You call a rat swarm to an empty space within range. It takes its turn after yours and obeys your mental commands. It vanishes when reduced to 0 hit points.

If you cast this spell again, the previous rat swarm vanishes.
empower: Summons two rat swarms instead. If you cast this spell again, both of them vanish.
